title: Cosmic Swirls.
content:
Welcome to Cosmic Swirls! Our website is dedicated to bringing you the latest news and updates on all things related to space exploration, astronomy, and astrophysics. 

Our team of experts curates the most interesting and informative articles from around the web, providing you with a one-stop-shop for all your cosmic curiosity needs. Whether you're interested in learning about the latest discoveries in our solar system, or want to explore the mysteries of the universe beyond, we've got you covered.

Join our community of space enthusiasts and stay up-to-date with the latest developments in space science. From stunning images captured by NASA's telescopes to in-depth analyses of the latest research findings, Cosmic Swirls has everything you need to satisfy your thirst for knowledge about the cosmos.

So come on in, sit back, and let us take you on a journey through the wonders of the universe.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract image of a comet passing through the solar system, with bright colors and swirling patterns that represent its trajectory."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
